columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the thread record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SOURCE_ORG_ID
columns.description: Stores the DXO record of the organization who exported the message

columns.name: SOURCE_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: EXPORT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: It stores the export instant in UTC.
